additionalDescription: The dropbox folder contains other unrelated files, like student grades, a bit strange. It's messy. They also recorded directed songs, and interactions between two males (a tutor-pupil pair)
description: The library currently includes recordings from 280 birds, including 160 tutor-pupil pairs. Each bird was placed singly in a sound attenuation chamber, and its vocal activity was recorded continuously over one week using Sound Analysis Pro. In addition to recording undirected songs, most birds were also recorded singing female directed and male directed songs.
locality: Sound attenuation chamber, in Rockefeller University Field Center Colony
name: Zebra finch 2021
title: The Rockefeller University Field Research Center Song Library
